meanings.sent1: The children begrimmed their faces while playing in the mud.
meanings.sent2: After working in the garden, her hands were begrimmed with soil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy managed to be begrimmed in paint from head to tail.
meanings.sent4: The old abandoned house was begrimmed with layers of dust and cobwebs.
meanings.sent5: The once pristine white walls were now begrimmed with soot and grime.

meanings.sent1: She tried to clean the begrim coat by brushing off the dirt.
meanings.sent2: The begrim windows obscured the view of the garden outside.
meanings.sent3: The begrim car looked like it had been through a mud bath.
meanings.sent4: The begrim walls of the cave seemed to absorb all light.
meanings.sent5: His begrim hands left smudges on everything he touched.
